Mr. Mike Pence has made it clear his legislation is aimed at Planned Parenthood Federation of America, which is the nation's biggest provider of abortion services and also a major recipient of Title X money. Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern,'' Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate. The term, probably derived from German, usually refers to an unscrupulous or unethical person.
